meanings.definition: A large naturally occurring community of flora and fauna occupying a major habitat
meanings.sent1: The biomes in the rainforest are filled with diverse plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study different biomes to understand how ecosystems function.
meanings.sent3: The biomes had a party, and all the plants and animals were invited!
meanings.sent4: The biomes of the ocean are like bustling cities under the sea.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the biomes of the desert revealed a world of survival and adaptation.

meanings.definition: A major regional group of distinctive plant and animal communities adapted to the region's climate
meanings.sent1: The desert biomes have unique plants and animals that can withstand extreme heat.
meanings.sent2: Each biome has its own set of species that are well-suited to the environment.
meanings.sent3: The biomes threw a costume party to show off their climate adaptations!
meanings.sent4: The biomes of the Arctic are like a frozen kingdom ruled by resilient creatures.
meanings.sent5: The biomes of the savanna showcase the beauty of nature's adaptations to different climates.
